question: When while changing my 7 month old son he urinates on me, do I require to take a new ghusl? Shukran
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is not necessary to take a Ghusl if your child urinated on you.

The urine of the child is impure and the clothes must be washed. Only the
affected portion of the body must be washed.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
